sense.def:
Kadar se zgodi
a shipwreck
, ladja doživi nesrečo na morju in je pri tem uničena.

seg.quote: The whole family perished in a shipwreck.

sense.def:
A shipwreck
je tudi ladja, ki je bila uničena v nesreči na morju.

seg.quote: Treasure has sometimes been found in shipwrecks.

sense.def:
To be shipwrecked
pomeni doživeti nesrečo na morju, v kateri je ladja uničena, tista oseba pa preživi in pride na kopno.

seg.quote: He was shipwrecked off the lonely island of Iona.
